Articles.Content:
Hi! i\'m italian and i not speak a good english, so speak slowly and easy to understand XD

Yesterday, i check to download (few times) the free application, but it don\'t run, 'empty .zip folder'.. Possible corrupted file?

Do you know the problem, of another url to download the game?

Thanks for help, Bye!!

Per tutti gli italiani non anglofoni in ascolto: se siete vivi battete un colpo!!!

Hello Paulo, I\'m Eretico of forumastronautico, first I\'ll answer in English because this forum is international.

I must say that I too have had problems in Kerbal download and unzip version 0.12.

But after a few days I managed to download it and unpack it with no problems.

Let\'s wait to hear some of the forum for possible solutions to the problem.

Sorry for my English.

P.S: Ci sono altri italiani appassionati di questo gioco in ascolto ?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to KSP Forums!

The problem your having can easily be fixed by downloading from the kerbal space program repository.

www.kerbalspacerepository.com

im not sure if the site is up at the moment. but it is usually a reliable secondary download source for the game

Keep posting!

Thanks, but the link don\'t run
